title: r/Choosingbeggars "I'm Poor ðŸ¥º... BUY ME STEAK DINNERS"
description: r/Choosingbeggars In today's episode, we have a literal choosing beggar! This guy claims to be completely broke and he needs strangers to buy him food so he can survive the week. Instead of asking for basic necessities, this guy demands steaks, chocolate, and other luxury foods! When people on Facebook call him out for being greedy, he doubles down and says that he deserves to eat like a king no matter how broke he is. Give me a break!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
